#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType PlayerHandicap.

== Name ==

*[CPlayerHandicap PlayerHandicap]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--PlayerHandicap (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Type to specify a player's handicap. The mandatory attribute specify the method used to compute
			the handicap.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  handicap-system = [SHandicapSystemEnum HandicapSystemEnum]  other = xs:string>[SFloatWithOneFractionalNumber FloatWithOneFractionalNumber]</...>

----

|| [SHandicapSystemEnum golfml:HandicapSystemEnum] || `handicap-system` ||   ||
|| xs:string || `other` ||  				Alternate value for an attribute.			 ||
